mapper.update:
update scenicspot
scenicname = #{scenicname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
max_people = #{max_people,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max_car = #{max_car,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=DATE},
update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=DATE},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
del_flag = #{del_flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
scenictype=#{scenictype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
max_di=#{max_di,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
team_tickets = #{teamTickets,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
individual_tickets = #{individualTickets,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
internet_tickets = #{internetTickets,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
parking_rate = #{parkingRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where code= #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,COUNT(b.id) pepoleCount, b.enter_day FROM tourist b LEFT JOIN scenicspot a ON a.id = b.science_id WHERE a.del_flag = 1 and b.del_flag = 1 GROUP BY b.enter_day,a.scenicname ORDER BY a.scenicname, b.enter_day DESC

SELECT a.*,COUNT(b.id) pepoleCount, b.enter_day FROM tourist b LEFT JOIN scenicspot a ON a.id = b.science_id WHERE a.del_flag = 1 AND b.del_flag = 1 AND a.code = #{code}
AND DATE_FORMAT(b.enter_day, '%Y-%m-%d-%h-%I-%S')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{enter_day}, '%Y-%m-%d-%h-%I-%S')
AND DATE_FORMAT(b.enter_day, '%Y-%m-%d-%h-%I-%S')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day}, '%Y-%m-%d-%h-%I-%S')
GROUP BY b.enter_day,a.scenicname ORDER BY a.scenicname, b.enter_day DESC
